column4: Hello, I recently finished installuing ubuntu minimal, everything is working fine. Exept sound, I have installed ALSA and it sees my card but I dont get any sound.
Thanks, I'm trying it right now.
what is the output of:  dpkg -l | grep pulse   you can use a pastebin to hold the output
xterm isnt letting me copy from it :/
I belive so, but how can I check?
However what should VLC be configured to to have it working correctly?
the defaults are usually ok. Do you get sound in an ubuntu liveCD?
I installed from the Ubuntu Minimal CD, sound was not included
yes, I know. But if you noot the Ubuntu liveCD do you get sound there
ok boot to the live Precise CD and check the installed pulse and alsa packages, then compare to your own
